column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Four star aspects: The coffee. Great quality beans and house-made syrups
column2: but the espresso drinks are always too cold and the mocha flavor not strong enough. And no matter how hard I try
column3: everything I eat here is super messy. The pastries crumble everywhere
column4: my beloved almond croissant leaves powdered sugar on my face for days
column5: the delicious sandwiches ooze out when you attempt to take a bite
column6: and they're barely small enough to fit in your mouth. And this is just a matter of personal preference
column7: but the flavor profiles are aimed at an ideal that I disagree with. Again
column8: a very high-brow point of contention
column9: but when I come here and spend $12 for simple eggs and coffee
column10: I want everything to be perfect.
